name: zCloudCommerce
tag_list: managed-cloud-services, integrated-project-management-tools, integrated-business-solutions, business-cloud-solutions, cloud-solutions-for-business, business-workflow-solutions-in-the-cloud, make-money-using-cloud, cloud-solution-partner-programs, cloud-co
overview: zCloudCommerce provides cloud computing services for business in one simple integrated social platform based on state-of-the-art cloud computing technologies. We will help business to grow revenue and profits through greater efficiency, increased time savings and an enhanced customer experience. zCloudCommerce, Inc helps companies to grow their revenue and profits through greater efficiency, increased time savings and an enhanced customer experience with easy, anywhere social commerce. strives to provide its customers with capabilities that large companies pay a lot of money to integrate and some they haven’t even started to use, all at an affordable cost. We also provide consulting services to help you better understand how cloud computing solutions can help you and how social media can give you an effective method to connect with your key stakeholders so you make provide better products and services.
